name: J D "masks aren't just for IP addresses" Eisenberg

content.value:
From command line, this works great:

java Example.java

but:

java Example

gives “Error could not find or load main class Example/caused by java.lang.ClassNotFoundException"

The %PATH% has the correct directories for JDK. Any ideas what’s going on?  2/2
content.html: From command line, this works great: java Example.java but: java Example gives “Error could not find or load main class Example/caused by java.lang.ClassNotFoundException" The %PATH% has the correct directories for JDK. Any ideas what’s going on? 2/2
